notes: [Added] Added Posts management sections in CP.
[Added] Added ability to easily re-post past social media posts.
[Added] Added `craft.socialPoster.posts()` template function to fetch successful posts on an entry.
[Added] Added `url` attribute on posts - this returns the external URL to the corresponding post on the social media provider you've posted to - ie https://facebook.com/mypost.
[Improved] Full JSON responses from providers are now saved for posterity, debugging, and future use.
[Improved] Improved Facebook posting, allowing you to properly post to either Profile, Page or Group.
[Fixed] Fixed version number (sorry!).
[Added] Added support for front-end submissions and overrides.
[Fixed] Fixed some issues with checking for account options not yet set.
[Fixed] Fixed issue with checking plugin dependancies.
[Added] Added support for Linked.in as a provider.
[Added] Added support for Facebook Pages, along with Personal timelines.
[Added] Added Title field to set the post title for Facebook and Linked.in posts.
[Added] Added URL field to allow specific URLs to be used with Facebook and Linked.in posts.
[Added] Added new setting for auto-post. Handy if you want the widget to appear, but not be default to on.
[Improved] Each field (apart from enabled) can be selectively hidden on the entry widget, allowing only certain settings to be overridden per-entry.
[Improved] Better Guzzle exception handling for all providers.
[Fixed] Prevent errors for non-supported providers.
[Fixed] Fixed issue with checking plugin dependancies.
Initial release.
